paper_abstract: As was pointed out in Ill, Theorem 8 of the paper On the Approximability and Hardness of Minimum Topic Connected Overlay and Its Special Instances [21 is incorrect. This corrigendum proves a slightly weaker version of this theorem. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
